name: dockerfile-project
description: Node.js files/configurations that support the creation of Dockerfiles
author: Brian Zalewski <brian@megabyte.space> (https://megabyte.space)

scripts.dockerhub:publish: npx lint-staged && run-s prepare-release && docker push megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:latest && docker push megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:slim
scripts.test:shellcheck: find . -type d \( -name .cache -o -name .git -o -name .husky -o -name .modules -o -name node_modules \) -prune -false -o -name .update.sh -prune -o -type f -name \*.sh -print0 | xargs -0 -r -n1 shellcheck

scripts-info.build: Build the Dockerfile and then build the slim image
scripts-info.build:latest: Build the Dockerfile the regular way
scripts-info.build:slim: Build a slim Docker image with Dockerslim
scripts-info.commit: The preferred way of running git commit (instead of git commit, we prefer running 'npm run commit')
scripts-info.dockerhub: Update the repository, lint the Dockerfile, build the Dockerfile images, and then, upload both the latest and slim images to Docker Hub.
scripts-info.info: Logs descriptions of all the npm tasks
scripts-info.prepare-release: Updates the CHANGELOG with commits made using 'npm run commit' and updates the project to be ready for release
scripts-info.shell: Run the Dockerfile and open its shell
scripts-info.sizes: List the sizes of the Dockerfile images on the system
scripts-info.test: Validates the Dockerfile and performs project linting
scripts-info.update: Runs .update.sh to automatically update meta files and documentation
scripts-info.version: Used by 'npm run prepare-release' to update the CHANGELOG and app version
